title: Define Urban Simulation Requirements
description: Gather and document requirements for the urban simulation functionality of the simulateurPlanificationUrbaine.

title: Design Urban Simulation Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the urban simulation component of the simulateurPlanificationUrbaine.

title: Develop Frontend for Urban Simulation Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the urban simulation component of the simulateurPlanificationUrbaine.

title: Develop Backend for Urban Simulation Logic
description: Implement the backend logic for the urban simulation component of the simulateurPlanificationUrbaine.

title: Implement Database Integration for Urban Simulation Data
description: Create the necessary database structures and implement data management functions for the urban simulation component of the simulateurPlanificationUrbaine.

title: Test and Debug Urban Simulation Component
description: Perform testing and debugging on the urban simulation component of the simulateurPlanificationUrbaine to ensure it functions as intended.
dependencies: Develop Frontend for Urban Simulation Interface
Develop Backend for Urban Simulation Logic

title: Review and Approve Urban Simulation Component Design
description: Review the design documents for the urban simulation component of the simulateurPlanificationUrbaine and provide feedback or approval.

title: Review and Approve Urban Simulation Component Code
description: Review the code for the urban simulation component of the simulateurPlanificationUrbaine and provide feedback or approval.
dependencies: Develop Frontend for Urban Simulation Interface
Develop Backend for Urban Simulation Logic

title: Detailed Documentation for Urban Simulation Component
description: Comprehensive documentation on the functionality and usage of the urban simulation component within the simulateurPlanificationUrbaine project. The documentation should include system requirements, user guides, API references, technical specifications, and examples of real-world applications. Additionally, the document should highlight any known limitations or potential improvements for future versions.
dependencies: Develop Frontend for Urban Simulation Interface
Develop Backend for Urban Simulation Logic
